title: VSL Logic EXS Performance Tool.zip
description:
This is the Vienna Symphonic Library Performance Tool for Mac OS X, version 1.1 exclusively for Logic Pro. I found it "on the line" ages ago, and almost forgot I had it. I know there are a lot of people out there who still use VSL (like me) and this torrent might help out.

Versions for Intel and PPC platforms are included.

Be advised: Being a 32bit add-on, it doesn't work with the latest incarnation of Logic, Logic Pro X.

After being installed, you'll find the tool under button "edit" in the EXS24 screen, a button called VSL with a drop down menu showing the different tools - Legato, Alternation, Repetition and HorizonLegato.

Screen dump at http://bayimg.com/FAPbMAafD



Tested on OS X Mavericks and Logic Pro 9.1.8, with imported VSL GIGA files into EXS24.


/DBplaYer
